name: Big Agnes Insulated AXL Air Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: This fast and light favourite is updated with light and efficient Primaloft® Gold insulation. Light enough to satisfy thru-hikers who cut the handle off their toothbrush, the Insulated AXL Air offers the kind of warmth and cushioning backpackers dream about. Ultralight Primaloft Gold insulation and mylar lamination reflect heat back to you while you sleep. Superlight fabric still stands up to the rigours of life on the trail. Oversize outer tubes cradle you in the centre of the pad, preventing you from rolling off in the night.Made of ultralight ripstop nylon with excellent  tear strength.Super-durable aviation-grade TPU lamination prevents leaks and punctures.Primaloft Gold series insulation that offers an incredible warmth to weight ratio, breathability and pack-abilityInternal heat reflective tech adds warmth.Antimicrobial treatment inside the pad.High-volume valve makes inflation and deflation quick and easy.Large outer chambers keep you centred on the pad.Internal construction provides stability and comfort while minimizing weight and packed size.Included inflation sack is made from upcycled material (colour varies).
